item.description:
If you only learn one Qigong practice, Fire Dragon Qigong, is one of the best ones you can do. Last time we started the first two parts, so here we'll go over those again and continue into the third part. Fire Dragon Qigong is an excellent exercise combining both Chinese medicine principles and qigong to eliminate disease and improve immunity. It enables you to remove energy blockages in the meridians as well as tonify and move qi in the meridians to strengthen the internal organs. Participants will benefit in the following ways:

• Increase qi and blood flow throughout the entire body
• Clear toxins
• Reinforce your immune system
• Replenish energy in the five major organs
• Calm your nervous system and emotions
item.name: February Qigong Meetup - Fire Dragon Qigong
